channel.title: Somewhere at the Bottom of the River Between Vega and Altair on
channel.description: Recent content in Somewhere at the Bottom of the River Between Vega and Altair on

item.title: Andria
item.description: [[songs/j/johnny_cash/the_legend_of_johnny_cash/hurt.md#what-have-i-become-my-sweetest-friend-vyl-wnanory|You still cross my mind from time to time]] [[songs/j/johnny_cash/the_legend_of_johnny_cash/hurt.md#what-have-i-become-my-sweetest-friend-vyl-wnanory|And I mostly smile]] [[songs/j/johnny_cash/the_legend_of_johnny_cash/hurt.md#what-have-i-become-my-sweetest-friend-vyl-wnanory|Still so set on finding out where we went wrong and]] [[songs/j/johnny_cash/the_legend_of_johnny_cash/hurt.

item.title: Bury Your Flame
item.description: [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/choke.md#look-into-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|Oh, we could blame it on our hands]] [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/choke.md#look-into-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|They lifted the drink to our mouths so we drank it]] [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/choke.

item.title: Damaged Goods
item.description: [[songs/i/iron_maiden/brave_new_world/brave_new_world.md#dragon-kings-dying-queens-vyl-wnanory|She forced a smile, said, “Boy, come kiss my mouth.]] [[songs/i/iron_maiden/brave_new_world/brave_new_world.md#dragon-kings-dying-queens-vyl-wnanory|You know that hope you’re holding to? It looks an awful lot like fear.

item.title: Fall Down, Never Get Back Up Again
item.description: [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/awakened/resilience.md#at-times-im-carried-on-the-shoulders-of-a-child-vyl-wnanory|Out where the stones lay like bones by the ocean]] [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/awakened/resilience.md#at-times-im-carried-on-the-shoulders-of-a-child-vyl-wnanory|Out where the waves crash contempt on the land]] [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/awakened/resilience.

item.title: Last Blues for Bloody Knuckles
item.description: [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.md#numb-numb-vyl-wnanory|“My precious wife]] [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.md#numb-numb-vyl-wnanory|I am in shambles]] [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.md#numb-numb-vyl-wnanory|I am crumbling, I am]] [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.md#numb-numb-vyl-wnanory|Was it something I did]] [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.md#numb-numb-vyl-wnanory|Bid the tide]] [[songs/a/archive/you_all_look_the_same_to_me/numb.

item.title: New Storms for Older Lovers
item.description: [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untethered.md#so-dry-your-eyes-dry-your-eyes-vyl-wnanory|I’ve come here as a man in shambles]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untethered.md#so-dry-your-eyes-dry-your-eyes-vyl-wnanory|Worn out from begging on my knees]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untethered.md#so-dry-your-eyes-dry-your-eyes-vyl-wnanory|Please, I’m just trying to keep my family together]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untethered.

item.title: Nobody, Not Even the Rain
item.description: [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/on_my_own.md#at-all-oh-vyl-wnanory|I know that someday you’ll be sleeping, darling]] [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/on_my_own.md#at-all-oh-vyl-wnanory|Likely dreaming off the pain]] [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/on_my_own.md#at-all-oh-vyl-wnanory|I hope you’ll hear me in the streetlights humming]] [[songs/t/the_red_jumpsuit_apparatus/the_hell_or_high_water_ep/on_my_own.

item.title: Sad Prayers for Guilty Bodies
item.description: [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/all_for_me.md#i-never-told-vyl-wnanory|They stored their passion in the creases]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/all_for_me.md#i-never-told-vyl-wnanory|In the corners of their mouths]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/all_for_me.md#i-never-told-vyl-wnanory|Every angle of light from the open window]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/all_for_me.

item.title: Said the King to the River
item.description: [[songs/m/mad_season/above/im_above.md#try-to-keep-bad-blood-in-the-past-vyl-wnanory|Up, my lady, pack your things, this place is not your home. Nor was it ever, sever every tie, tonight we ride.

item.title: Such Small Hands
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_by_april/stronger/leaves_falling.md#put-my-trust-in-you-my-love-defended-you-vyl-wnanory|I think I saw you in my sleep, darling]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/stronger/leaves_falling.md#put-my-trust-in-you-my-love-defended-you-vyl-wnanory|I think I saw you in my dreams, you were]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/stronger/leaves_falling.

item.title: The Castle Builders
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#to-find-it-vyl-wnanory|Now speak of anger]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#to-find-it-vyl-wnanory|Forget all the fears you’ve kept]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#to-find-it-vyl-wnanory|About love and sex and death and faith]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#to-find-it-vyl-wnanory|Erased, or swinging sweet]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.

item.title: The Last Lost Continent
item.description: [[songs/h/hundreds/lets_write_the_streets/lets_write_the_streets.md#to-walk-alone-vyl-wnanory|I felt your sickness]] [[songs/h/hundreds/lets_write_the_streets/lets_write_the_streets.md#to-walk-alone-vyl-wnanory|Brush against my arm]] [[songs/h/hundreds/lets_write_the_streets/lets_write_the_streets.md#to-walk-alone-vyl-wnanory|As I walked by you]] [[songs/h/hundreds/lets_write_the_streets/lets_write_the_streets.md#to-walk-alone-vyl-wnanory|Heard your voice but]] [[songs/h/hundreds/lets_write_the_streets/lets_write_the_streets.md#to-walk-alone-vyl-wnanory|Couldn’t tell that it was you]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/rooms_of_the_house/extraordinary_dinner_party.

item.title: Then Again, Maybe You Were Right
item.description: [[songs/k/kelli_ali/teardrop_hittin_the_ground/lucifer_rising.md#strange-vyl-wnanory|I spoke too soon, it seems]] [[songs/k/kelli_ali/teardrop_hittin_the_ground/lucifer_rising.md#strange-vyl-wnanory|For you made a home in my dreams while I slept]] [[songs/k/kelli_ali/teardrop_hittin_the_ground/lucifer_rising.md#strange-vyl-wnanory|You kept running yourself through my head]] [[songs/k/kelli_ali/teardrop_hittin_the_ground/lucifer_rising.
